content.raw:
I had the problem when i built apk from source:

..... 
my_workspace/rosandroid/android_app_chooser/src/org/ros/android/android_app_chooser/RobotMasterChooser.java:81: error: package org.ros.android.robotapp does not exist
    [javac] import org.ros.android.robotapp.RobotsContentProvider;
    [javac]                                ^
    [javac] my_workspace/rosandroid/android_app_chooser/src/org/ros/android/android_app_chooser/MasterAdapter.java:50: error: cannot find symbol
    [javac]   public MasterAdapter(RobotMasterChooser rmc, List<RobotDescription> robots) 
.....


Please help me. thanks.

..... my_workspace/rosandroid/android_app_chooser/src/org/ros/android/android_app_chooser/RobotMasterChooser.java:81: error: package org.ros.android.robotapp does not exist [javac] import org.ros.android.robotapp.RobotsContentProvider; [javac] ^ [javac] my_workspace/rosandroid/android_app_chooser/src/org/ros/android/android_app_chooser/MasterAdapter.java:50: error: cannot find symbol [javac] public MasterAdapter(RobotMasterChooser rmc, List<RobotDescription> robots) .....
